The Anatomy of a
Perfect Spoof

Dive deep into the technology that makes Browser Fingerprint undetectable. We don't just hide your identity; we create a new one.

UNDER THE HOOD

Core Technology

Our software provides granular control over every aspect of your browser identity, engineered for stability and stealth.

Kernel Injection

We modify the Chromium engine at C++ level, not JavaScript injection which can be detected.

Deep Dive: Standard anti-detects use JS injection which leaves traces in the DOM. PrintGuard recompiles the browser engine to return spoofed values natively.

Native Noise

Canvas and Audio fingerprints are altered mathematically to produce unique, consistent hashes.

Deep Dive: We apply a unique noise algorithm that persists per session. Even if you refresh the page, your Canvas hash remains consistent but unique.

Font Enumeration

Custom font packing ensures your font list matches the spoofed OS exactly.

Deep Dive: If you spoof macOS on Windows, we hide system fonts like Calibri and inject San Francisco, passing advanced font enumeration tests.

Complete Fingerprint Control

Customize every single parameter that websites use to track you.

Hardware

  • CPU Concurrency
  • Device Memory (RAM)
  • Screen Resolution
  • Battery Status

Connection

  • WebRTC IP Handling
  • DNS Leak Protection
  • Timezone Spoofing
  • Geolocation

Media Devices

  • Audio Inputs/Outputs
  • Video Inputs
  • Media Capability
  • Speech Synthesis

Browser

  • User Agent
  • Do Not Track
  • Navigator Object
  • Client Rects

Developer First API

Automate profile creation, launching, and termination with our REST API or local libraries.

  • Headless Chrome Support
  • Local & Cloud Execution
  • Real-time Profile Status

Designed for Scale

Used by teams requiring high-fidelity session management.

Ad Verification

Emulate users from specific geos and devices to verify ad placements and catch fraud without triggering bot detection systems.

Multi-Accounting

Manage hundreds of social media or e-commerce accounts in isolated environments, preventing cross-contamination and bans.

Start Securing Your Sessions Today

Join thousands of businesses that trust BrowserShield for their multi-accounting and automation needs.

Browser Fingerprint is an anti-detect browser designed to securely manage multiple accounts by creating isolated browser profiles with protected fingerprints, optimized for digital marketing, advertising, e-commerce, and automation.
